AppLoader.config_keys_error: The config file is not the same as the example one. Some keys are missing.
AppLoader.config_values_error: Some keys are not filled in your config file. This will cause issues.
AppLoader.new_update: A new update is available (version %{version}). Click to install.
AppLoader.new_terms: New terms were published. In order to use the application, you have to reconnect before accepting them.

Home.title: Home
Home.cannot_fetch_wallet: An error occured when fetching your information.

Refill.title: Refill
Refill.bad_amount: The amount must be between %{min} and %{max}.
Refill.not_contributor_desc: It is impossible for non-BDE-UTC-cotributors to transfer money or buy stuff in places like Picasso. The money refilled will not be refunded.
Refill.cannot_verify_contribution: An error has happened during your BDE-UTC contribution verification.

Transfer.title: Transfer
Transfer.bad_amount: The amount must be between %{min} and %{max}.
Transfer.confirm_message: Do you confirm your transfer of %{amount} to %{name}?
Transfer.not_contributor_desc: Transfers are reserved to BDE-UTC contributors.
message_suggestions: Do not hesitate to refund me!
It's only a transfer after all
I really owed you that much?
How can I drink at the Pic now?
How cool it is to be a BDE-UTC contributor!
Here it is the UTC of Compi√®gne

Auth.title: Connection
Auth.wrong_ext: Check that you gave the right email adress you gave for your external contribution.
Auth.wrong_cas: Check that you correctly wrote down your CAS-UTC login and password.
Auth.valid_terms: By clicking "%{button}" you accept all the terms
Auth.wrong_nouvo: To use the application, you need to finish your registration to the UTC.

BiometricAuth.title: Security mode
BiometricAuth.disable_desc: You will have to reconnect with your credentials.

History.title: Historic
History.good_job: Good job, you went all along!

Stats.title: Statistics
Stats.receive_ranking: People who sent you the most money
Stats.give_ranking: People to who you sent the most money

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.mail_body:
Hello! 

First of all, thank you for this application!
Settings.profile_desc: Account information, badge management and disconnection.
Settings.security_mode_desc: Ask for authentication before a transfer, a refill or a badge locking.
Settings.security_mode_app_opening_desc: Ask for authentication when you open PayUTC.

About.title: About
About.developed_disc:
The application and its code are owned by the SiMDE-UTC (conventionned commission of the BDE-UTC).
Each file is also owned by their authors.

All kind of contributions are deeply appreciated.
About.in_development: The application can not be updated when it is in development under Expo.
About.need_update: The application needs to be updated!
About.update_version: The application is under version %{current}. Click to update to version %{next}.

Profile.title: My account
Profile.lock_confirmed_desc: Your badge can no longer be use to pay.
Profile.unlock_confirmed_desc: Your badge can be use to pay again.
Profile.lock_info: When the badge is locked, it can no more be used to pay.
Profile.change_pin_desc: The PIN code is for the sellers in order to use PayUTC payment terminals.
Profile.cant_change_pin: You don't have the right to do this.
Profile.is_not_contributor: You are not a BDE-UTC contributor
Profile.contributor_desc: Being a contributor allows you to access the MDE, the Picasso and any event organized by the BDE. It also gives you a lot of advantages in Compi√®gne shops.

api.connection_retry: The application was unable to access to Internet. Would you want to retry?
